arm_group.description: Sarpogrelate HCl 300mg once a day or 100mg three times a day
Sarpogrelate HCl 300mg once a day or 100mg three times a day

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics of sarpogrelate
      controlled-release formulation (CR) in comparison to immediate-release formulation (IR) and
      Food effect on the pharmacokinetics of sarpogrelate CR.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Food Effect of Sarpogrelate HCl CR Formulation in Comparison to Immediate-release Formulation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  20 to 55 years of healthy volunteers

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Hypersensitivity Reaction about Sarpogrelate HCl or other antiplatelets

intervention.description: Sarpogrelate HCl 300mg once a day or 100mg three times a day
Sarpogrelate HCl 300mg once a day or 100mg three times a day

clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Single Dose, 3-Treatment, 3-Period Williams-Design to Assess the Pharmacokinetic Characteristics and Food Effect of Sarpogrelate HCl CR Tablets Compared With Sarpogrelate HCl IR Tablets in Healthy Male Subjects

oversight_info.authority: South Korea: Korea Food and Drug Administration (KFDA)
